02. What type of fuel does your household mainly use for cooking?
Natural floor, such as dirt, earth, sand, dung
Rudimentary floor, such as wood, palm/bamboo
Finished floor, such as cement, polished wood, vinyl strips, tiles,
Natural walls, such as no walls, dirt, cane/palm/trunks
Rudimentary walls, such as bamboo with mud, stone with mud, plywood, cardboard, reused wood
Finished walls, such as cement, cement blocks, bricks, wood planks/shingles, polished wood,
Natural roofing, such as no roof, thatch/palm leaf, sod
Rudimentary roofing, such as wood, rustic mat, cardboard, palm/bamboo
Finished roofing, such as metal, iron sheets, shingles, tiles, cement
